Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8457 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-8457 affecting package ceph for versions less than 18.2.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 18.2.1-1, affected by CVE-2019-8457
